lines_and_colors: Of Tolling Bell I ask the cause?
I'm answered in a lonesome tone -
That Bells should ring till all should know
A Soul had gone to Heaven
Would seem to me - the more the way
A Good News should be given -
document.title: Of tolling bell I ask the cause?
document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
